============ ISP ============
en
conf t
hostname ISP
int e0/0
ip add 192.168.0.6 255.255.255.128
no sh
exit
int e0/1
ip add 208.10.12.1 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 208.10.12.2
do wr

ip route 53.94.32.8 255.255.255.252 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.48.68.0 255.255.255.252 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.5.128 255.255.255.224 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.4.0 255.255.255.0 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.2.0 255.255.255.0 208.10.12.2

ip route 53.94.32.12 255.255.255.252 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.0.0 255.255.254.0 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.5.0 255.255.255.128 208.10.12.2
ip route 172.16.3.0 255.255.255.0 208.10.12.2
do wr
